profile.description: I am a person passionate about web application development. I like to take advantage of all available online resources in order to be a developer capable of finding sophisticated solutions to complex problems.

text-card.excel: Specialization course in Excel completed in 2017
text-card.powerpoint: Specialization course in PowerPoint completed in 2017
text-card.word: Specialization course in Word completed in 2017
text-card.azure: Specialization course in Azure completed in 2021

azure-ul.li-2: Describe the differences between public, private, and hybrid cloud models.
azure-ul.li-4: Describe the differences between infrastructure as a service (IaaS), platform as a service (PaaS), and software as a service (SaaS).

text-recognitions.text-risk:
This web application containts a lot of lenguages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript to design the web page and python for data manipulation.
Challenge is to use open-source environmental data and other open-source information (such as epidemiological, social, policy and economic data) as available to build and demonstrate a prototype smartphone application that can provide individualized, geolocated, COVID-19 risk warnings to guide social awareness, response, and health security.
text-recognitions.text-instructor: I gave classes to teachers of level middle superior about educational platforms for six mounths in the plaform Teams
